segments.text: Did you go to school today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I went to school today . Were you there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I didn't go , I've been sick .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sucks . Did you want the assignments from English class ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That would be nice , thank you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will be glad to do the same for you when you're sick .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , thank you . I hope to see you at school tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
